amendment.description: Relative to the effective date following enactment of the Act.

action.text: SA 3013 fell when SA 3012 was withdrawn.
Amendment SA 3013 proposed by Senator Frist to Amendment SA 3012. (consideration: CR S3628; text: CR S3628) Relative to the effective date following enactment of the Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3013 proposed by Senator Frist to Amendment SA 3012.
